title: Miniature Portrait of John Neagle (1796-1865)
medium: watercolor on ivory; gold metal frame
provenance_text: John Neagle [1796-1865], until 1865; by descent to his daughters; gift to Miss Elizabeth W. Wiley, Germantown, Philadelphia, PA; gift to Mary Hale Coffin, her niece; acquired by Frank W. Bayley, Boston, MA; purchased by George S. Palmer, New London, CT; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, October 9, 1922; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.
